 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 24 01 09 01 2C 11 0A 41 42 5F 36 74 68 47 6F 6E 67 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_6thGong01_s

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	Return
endif

End

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_BedFleas_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$E9$00$00$00$06$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "timer$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 02 05 20 58 18 10 00 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 30 2E 31 E5 10 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 24 01 09 01 06 01 0B 05 20 58 E0 10 00 06 01 09 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 06 01 06 13 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3C 20 33 30 30 06 01 04 11 20 47 09 52 61 6E 64 6F 6D 31 30 30 20 3E 20 38 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 18 20 58 21 11 20 6F 0C 41 42 5F 64 69 73 5F 46 6C 65 61 73 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1D 11 0C 41 42 5F 64 69 73 5F 46 6C 65 61 73 00 10 19 00 59 6F 75 20 68 61 76 65 20 63 6F 6E 74 72 61 63 74 65 64 20 46 6C 65 61 73 00 00 09 01 09 01 09 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_BedFleas_s

float timer

if ( OnActivate )
    set timer to 0.1
    ShowRestMenu
endif

if ( MenuMode == 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif

if ( GetPCSleep )
    if ( timer > 0 )
        set timer to 0
        if ( GetDistance Player < 300 )
            if ( Random100 > 80 )
                if ( Player->GetSpellEffects ""AB_dis_Fleas"" == 0 )
                    Player->AddSpell ""AB_dis_Fleas""
                    MessageBox ""You have contracted Fleas""
                endif
				endif
        endif
    endif
endif

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_Bellows_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$BB$00$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 1F 10 00 24 01 08 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 18 10 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 24 01 08 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 15 10 01 00 03 00 2F 11 0A 41 42 5F 42 65 6C 6C 6F 77 73 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 08 01 06 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 0B 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 31 35 2E 35 24 01 09 01 51 11 0A 41 42 5F 42 65 6C 6C 6F 77 73 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_Bellows_s
; Script for constantly activated forge bellows

Short state
Float timer

If ( CellChanged )
	Return
Elseif ( MenuMode )
	Return
Endif

If ( OnActivate )
	Set state to 1
Endif

If ( state == 0 )
	Return
Elseif ( state == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 3 0
	PlayLoopSound3DVP AB_Bellows 1.0 1.0
	Set timer to 0
	Set state to 2
Elseif ( state == 2 )
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	If ( timer < 15.5 ) ; ~4 cycles - ( 1 + 3 repeats in LoopGroup )
		Return
	Endif
	StopSound AB_Bellows
;	PlayGroup Idle 2
	Set state to 0
Endif

End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_CentSphereChute_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00>$00$00$00$07$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "DoOnce$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 15 10 06 00 00 01 F9 10 00 00 7A 44 00 00 A0 40 00 00 00 00 07 00 14 00 14 00 14 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_CentSphereChute_s

short DoOnce

if ( DoOnce == 0 )
	LoopGroup Idle7 0 1
	AIWander 1000 5 0 20 20 20 20 20 0 0 0
	set DoOnce to 1
endif

End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_ComDisplay_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$1F$01$00$00$06$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "state$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 09 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 58 61 11 20 3E 20 30 2C 11 0B 4C 6F 63 6B 65 64 43 68 65 73 74 08 01 02 08 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 32 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 2D 11 15 44 6F 6F 72 20 4C 61 74 63 68 65 64 20 54 77 6F 20 4F 70 65 6E 00 00 00 3F 00 00 80 3F 08 01 02 08 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 33 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 33 2D 11 11 44 6F 6F 72 20 43 72 65 61 6B 79 20 43 6C 6F 73 65 00 00 00 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 34 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 14 10 01 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 14 10 03 00 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 33 14 10 02 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 34 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 34 14 10 00 00 00 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_ComDisplay_s

short state
; 0 = initial state
; 1 = opening
; 2 = open
; 3 = closing
; 4 = closed

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( getLocked > 0 )
		playSound3D ""LockedChest""
	elseif ( state > 2 )
		set state to 1
		PlaySound3DVP ""Door Latched Two Open"" 0.5 1.0
	elseif ( state < 3 )
		set state to 3
		PlaySound3DVP ""Door Creaky Close"" 0.5 1.0
	endif
endif


if ( state == 0 ); set the lid to closed
	set state to 4
endif

if ( state == 1 ); the lid is opening
	PlayGroup Idle2 0
	set state to 2
	return
endif

if ( state == 2 ); the lid has finished opening
	PlayGroup Idle4 0
	return
endif

if ( state == 3 ); the lid is closing
	PlayGroup Idle3 0
	set state to 4
	return
endif

if ( state == 4 ); the lid has finished closing
	PlayGroup Idle 0
endif

end$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_ComPlnGrinder_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$B4$01$00$00$11$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [41 63 74 69 6F 6E 46 6C 61 67 00 54 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 06 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1F 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 14 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 43 6F 6D 50 6C 6E 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 20 3C 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 14 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 43 6F 6D 50 6C 6E 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 01 00 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 15 10 01 00 05 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 14 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 43 6F 6D 50 6C 6E 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 08 01 0D 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 06 01 01 19 20 58 88 11 20 62 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1F 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 14 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 43 6F 6D 50 6C 6E 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 20 3E 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 14 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 43 6F 6D 50 6C 6E 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 01 00 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 0A 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 36 2E 30 24 01 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 06 01 01 15 20 58 88 11 20 62 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 00 51 11 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_ComPlnGrinder_s

Short ActionFlag
Float Timer

If ( MenuMode )
	Return
Endif

If ( OnActivate )
	If ( ActionFlag == 0 )
		If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_ComPlnGrinder < 1 )
			Player->AddItem AB_Rep_ComPlnGrinder 1
		Endif
		Set ActionFlag to 1
	Endif
Endif

If ( ActionFlag == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 5 0
	Player->Equip AB_Rep_ComPlnGrinder
	Set ActionFlag to 2
Elseif ( ActionFlag == 2 )
	If ( GetSoundPlaying ""AB_GrindStone"" == 0 )
		PlayLoopSound3DVP ""AB_GrindStone"" 1.0 1.0
	Endif
	If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_ComPlnGrinder > 0 )
		Player->RemoveItem AB_Rep_ComPlnGrinder 1
	endif
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	If ( timer < 6.0 )
		Return
	Endif
	Set timer to 0
	PlayGroup Idle 0
	Set ActionFlag to 0
Endif

If ( GetSoundPlaying ""AB_GrindStone"" )
	StopSound ""AB_GrindStone""
Endif

End

$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCVR "state$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 58 61 11 20 21 3D 20 30 02 10 0A 4C 6F 63 6B 65 64 44 6F 6F 72 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 01 00 01 02 10 15 44 6F 6F 72 20 4C 61 74 63 68 65 64 20 54 77 6F 20 4F 70 65 6E 08 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 14 10 02 00 01 02 10 11 44 6F 6F 72 20 43 72 65 61 6B 79 20 43 6C 6F 73 65 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 31 20 73 01 00 20 2D 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_ComShelfDoor_s

; 0 = closed
; 1 = opened
short state

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
    return
endif

if ( GetLocked != 0 )
    PlaySound ""LockedDoor""
    return
endif

if ( state == 0 )
    PlayGroup Idle2 1
    PlaySound ""Door Latched Two Open""
elseif ( state == 1 )
    PlayGroup idle3 1
    PlaySound ""Door Creaky Close""
endif

set state to ( 1 - state )

end

 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 0B 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 15 10 01 00 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 07 20 34 2E 31 36 36 37 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 15 10 03 00 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 33 05 01 66 01 00 07 20 32 2E 30 38 33 33 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 02 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 33 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DePalisadeGate_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 + idle = closed
; state 1 + idle2 = opening
; state 2 + idle 3 = open
; state 3 + idle4 = closing

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		LoopGroup Idle2 0
		set state to 1
		set timer to 4.1667
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		LoopGroup Idle4 0
		set state to 3
		set timer to 2.0833
	else
		Return
	endif
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
	set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	set state to 2
elseif ( state == 3 )
	set state to 0
endif


End$00"

 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_DwrvCentChute_s

float timer
short state

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

	if ( CellChanged )
		set state to 0
	endif
elseif ( State == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance player < 300 )
		Set State to 1
		PlayGroup Idle2
		set timer to 5.667
	endif
elseif ( State == 1 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		Return
	else

70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 1A 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 72 76 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 50 6F 77 65 72 65 64 01 00 00 10 28 00 59 6F 75 20 72 65 74 72 69 65 76 65 20 74 68 65 20 63 68 61 72 67 65 64 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 2E 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 24 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvCohererCharger_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == empty
; state 1 == charging
; state 2 == lowering
; state 3 == done charging - ready to pick up

; idle == broken
; idle2 == charging
; idle3 == done charging

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		PlayGroup Idle3
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 2.25
		PlaySound3DVP ""Dwemer Door Close"" 0.5 1.0
		set state to 2
		Return
	endif
elseif ( state == 2 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 0
		set state to 3
		Return
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""misc_dwrv_artifact50"" >= 1 )
			Player->RemoveItem ""misc_dwrv_artifact50"" 1
			MessageBox ""You place the Dwemer Coherer into the opening.""
			PlaySound3DVP ""Dwemer Door Close"" 0.5 1.0
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			set state to 1
			set timer to 8
			Return
		elseif ( Player->GetItemCount ""AB_Misc_DwrvCohererPowered"" >= 1 )
			MessageBox ""Nothing happens when you place the Powered Dwemer Coherer into the socket.""
			Return
		else
			MessageBox ""You see an opening which might fit a Dwemer Coherer.""
			Return
		endif
	elseif ( state == 3 )
		Player->AddItem ""AB_Misc_DwrvCohererPowered"" 1
		MessageBox ""You retrieve the charged Dwemer Coherer.""
		set state to 0
		Return
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End
$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvFuseBox_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$F5$01$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 0B 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 06 01 01 1A 20 58 88 11 20 62 0E 50 6F 77 65 72 20 6C 69 67 68 74 20 35 30 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0E 50 6F 77 65 72 20 6C 69 67 68 74 20 35 30 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 14 10 02 00 00 06 01 01 17 20 58 88 11 20 62 0B 50 6F 77 65 72 20 4C 69 67 68 74 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0B 50 6F 77 65 72 20 4C 69 67 68 74 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 06 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 08 01 02 09 20 66 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 09 01 06 01 10 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 0C 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 07 20 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 14 6D 69 73 63 5F 64 77 72 76 5F 61 72 74 69 66 61 63 74 36 30 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 14 6D 69 73 63 5F 64 77 72 76 5F 61 72 74 69 66 61 63 74 36 30 01 00 00 10 23 00 59 6F 75 20 72 65 70 6C 61 63 65 20 74 68 65 20 62 72 6F 6B 65 6E 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 54 75 62 65 2E 00 00 15 10 01 00 00 01 51 11 0E 50 6F 77 65 72 20 6C 69 67 68 74 20 35 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 30 2E 37 24 01 07 01 02 00 10 2C 00 54 68 65 20 62 72 6F 6B 65 6E 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 54 75 62 65 20 6E 65 65 64 73 20 74 6F 20 62 65 20 72 65 70 6C 61 63 65 64 2E 00 00 24 01 09 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvFuseBox_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == broken
; state 1 == placing wire
; state 2 == fixed

; idle == broken
; idle2 == placing wire
; idle3 == fixed

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Power light 50"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Power light 50"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		PlayGroup Idle3
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Power Light"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Power Light"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 0
		; THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN MAKE SOMETHING ELSE HAPPEN AFTER FIXING IT
		set state to 2
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""misc_dwrv_artifact60"" >= 1 )
			Player->RemoveItem ""misc_dwrv_artifact60"" 1
			MessageBox ""You replace the broken Dwemer Tube.""
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			StopSound ""Power light 50""
			set state to 1
			set timer to 0.7
			Return
		else
			MessageBox ""The broken Dwemer Tube needs to be replaced.""
			Return
		endif
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End

$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvGearBox_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00N$01$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 08 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 08 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 14 10 01 00 00 06 01 01 15 20 58 88 11 20 62 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 0D 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 09 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 05 1C 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 10 6D 69 73 63 5F 64 77 72 76 5F 67 65 61 72 30 30 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 10 6D 69 73 63 5F 64 77 72 76 5F 67 65 61 72 30 30 01 00 00 10 2A 00 59 6F 75 20 70 6C 61 63 65 20 61 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 43 6F 67 20 69 6E 74 6F 20 74 68 65 20 6D 65 63 68 61 6E 69 73 6D 2E 00 00 15 10 01 00 00 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 24 01 07 01 01 00 10 2A 00 54 68 65 20 6D 65 63 68 61 6E 69 73 6D 20 61 70 70 65 61 72 73 20 74 6F 20 62 65 20 6D 69 73 73 69 6E 67 20 61 20 63 6F 67 2E 00 00 09 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvGearBox_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == broken
; state 1 == fixed

; idle == broken
; idle2 == fixed

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
	elseif ( state == 1 )
		PlayGroup Idle2
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Machinery"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Machinery"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""misc_dwrv_gear00"" >= 1 )
			Player->RemoveItem ""misc_dwrv_gear00"" 1
			MessageBox ""You place a Dwemer Cog into the mechanism.""
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			; THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN MAKE SOMETHING ELSE HAPPEN AFTER FIXING IT
			set state to 1
			Return
		else
			MessageBox ""The mechanism appears to be missing a cog.""
		endif
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End

$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvJunctionBox_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$94$02$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 0B 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 06 01 01 18 20 58 88 11 20 62 0C 41 42 5F 44 77 54 69 63 6B 69 6E 67 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0C 41 42 5F 44 77 54 69 63 6B 69 6E 67 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 14 10 02 00 00 06 01 01 17 20 58 88 11 20 62 0B 50 6F 77 65 72 20 4C 69 67 68 74 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0B 50 6F 77 65 72 20 4C 69 67 68 74 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 07 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 08 01 03 09 20 66 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 51 11 0C 41 42 5F 44 77 54 69 63 6B 69 6E 67 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 09 01 06 01 12 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 0E 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 06 26 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 1A 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 72 76 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 50 6F 77 65 72 65 64 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 1A 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 72 76 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 50 6F 77 65 72 65 64 01 00 00 10 36 00 59 6F 75 20 70 6C 61 63 65 20 74 68 65 20 50 6F 77 65 72 65 64 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 20 69 6E 74 6F 20 74 68 65 20 6F 70 65 6E 69 6E 67 2E 00 00 15 10 01 00 00 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 32 24 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 08 01 02 20 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 14 6D 69 73 63 5F 64 77 72 76 5F 61 72 74 69 66 61 63 74 35 30 20 3E 3D 20 31 00 10 4B 00 4E 6F 74 68 69 6E 67 20 68 61 70 70 65 6E 73 20 77 68 65 6E 20 79 6F 75 20 70 6C 61 63 65 20 74 68 65 20 69 6E 61 63 74 69 76 65 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 20 69 6E 74 6F 20 74 68 65 20 73 6F 63 6B 65 74 2E 00 00 24 01 07 01 02 00 10 34 00 59 6F 75 20 73 65 65 20 61 6E 20 6F 70 65 6E 69 6E 67 20 77 68 69 63 68 20 6D 69 67 68 74 20 66 69 74 20 61 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 43 6F 68 65 72 65 72 2E 00 00 24 01 09 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvJunctionBox_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == broken
; state 1 == placing coherer
; state 2 == fixed

; idle == broken
; idle2 == placing coherer
; idle3 == fixed

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""AB_DwTicking"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""AB_DwTicking"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		PlayGroup Idle3
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Power Light"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Power Light"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 0
		; THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN MAKE SOMETHING ELSE HAPPEN AFTER FIXING IT
		StopSound ""AB_DwTicking""
		set state to 2
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""AB_Misc_DwrvCohererPowered"" >= 1 )
			Player->RemoveItem ""AB_Misc_DwrvCohererPowered"" 1
			MessageBox ""You place the Powered Dwemer Coherer into the opening.""
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			set state to 1
			set timer to 2
			Return
		elseif ( Player->GetItemCount ""misc_dwrv_artifact50"" >= 1 )
			MessageBox ""Nothing happens when you place the inactive Dwemer Coherer into the socket.""
			Return
		else
			MessageBox ""You see an opening which might fit a Dwemer Coherer.""
			Return
		endif
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvLightningRod_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00.$03$00$00$11$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [72 61 6E 00 73 74 72 69 6B 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 02 05 20 58 1F 10 00 14 10 00 00 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 58 A1 10 20 21 3D 20 35 24 01 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 24 01 08 01 1E 09 20 66 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 58 21 10 64 00 30 30 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 38 30 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 39 2E 35 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 36 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 38 30 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 37 2E 32 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 36 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 37 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 32 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 34 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 34 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 31 35 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 32 30 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 36 2E 33 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 31 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 31 35 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 33 09 01 08 01 03 08 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 35 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 31 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 38 09 01 07 01 01 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 35 09 01 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 32 35 06 01 01 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 31 09 01 09 01 06 01 18 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 15 10 01 00 00 00 BA 11 13 41 42 5F 6C 69 67 68 74 40 5F 4C 69 67 68 74 6E 69 6E 67 01 00 00 00 80 3F 01 00 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 58 21 10 64 00 30 30 06 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 38 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 2D 11 0F 41 42 5F 54 68 75 6E 64 65 72 63 6C 61 70 30 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 36 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 38 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 2D 11 0F 41 42 5F 54 68 75 6E 64 65 72 63 6C 61 70 31 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 36 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 2D 11 0F 41 42 5F 54 68 75 6E 64 65 72 63 6C 61 70 32 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 32 30 06 01 01 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 34 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 2D 11 0F 41 42 5F 54 68 75 6E 64 65 72 63 6C 61 70 33 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 07 01 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 2D 11 0F 41 42 5F 54 68 75 6E 64 65 72 63 6C 61 70 34 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 06 01 01 13 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3C 20 34 30 30 AD 11 17 41 42 5F 74 72 61 70 5F 4C 69 67 68 74 6E 69 6E 67 53 74 72 69 6B 65 09 01 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvLightningRod_s

short ran
float timer
short strike

DontSaveObject 

if ( CellChanged )
	PlayGroup Idle
	Return
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( GetCurrentWeather != 5 )
	Return
endif

set timer to ( timer - getsecondspassed )

if ( timer > 0 )
	Return
elseif ( timer <= 0 )
	set ran to random 100
	if ( ran > 80 )
		set timer to 9.5
	elseif ( ran > 60 )
		if ( ran <= 80 )
			set timer to 7.2
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 40 )
		if ( ran <= 60 )
			set timer to 7
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 20 )
		if ( ran <= 40 )
			set timer to 4
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 15 )
		if ( ran <= 20 )
			set timer to 6.3
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 10 )
		if ( ran <= 15 )
			set timer to 3
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 5 )
		if ( ran <= 10 )
			set timer to 8
		endif
	else
		set timer to 5
	endif
endif

if ( ran < 25 )
	if ( strike == 0 )
		set strike to 1
	endif
endif

if ( strike == 1 )
	; MessageBox ""Strike!""
	LoopGroup Idle2 0 0
	PlaceAtMe ""AB_light@_Lightning"" 1 1 1
	set ran to random 100
	if ( ran > 80 )
		Player->PlaySound3DVP AB_Thunderclap0 1.0 1.0
	elseif ( ran > 60 )
		if ( ran <= 80 )
			Player->PlaySound3DVP AB_Thunderclap1 1.0 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 40 )
		if ( ran <= 60 )
			Player->PlaySound3DVP AB_Thunderclap2 1.0 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( ran > 20 )
		if ( ran <= 40 )
			Player->PlaySound3DVP AB_Thunderclap3 1.0 1.0
		endif
	else
		Player->PlaySound3DVP AB_Thunderclap4 1.0 1.0
	endif
	if ( GetDistance Player < 400 )
		ExplodeSpell ""AB_trap_LightningStrike""
	endif
	set strike to 0
endif


End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvMachineryToggle_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$8D$00$00$00$06$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "state$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 0B 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 01 06 01 01 15 20 58 88 11 20 62 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 14 10 01 00 01 06 01 01 15 20 58 88 11 20 62 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 20 3D 3D 20 31 51 11 09 4D 61 63 68 69 6E 65 72 79 09 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvMachineryToggle_s

Short state

; This script relies on an external script to toggle the state variable for this object.
; This can also be accomplished with globals or journal entries.

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle 1
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Machinery"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Machinery"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( state == 1 )
		PlayGroup Idle2 1
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Machinery"" == 1 )
			StopSound ""Machinery""
		endif
	endif
endif

End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvPipeBurst_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00E$02$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 08 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 06 01 01 11 20 58 88 11 20 62 05 53 74 65 61 6D 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 05 53 74 65 61 6D 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 14 10 02 00 00 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 07 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 08 01 03 09 20 66 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 51 11 05 53 74 65 61 6D 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 09 01 06 01 13 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 0F 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 0B 1E 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 12 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 72 76 52 75 62 62 65 72 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 07 21 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 15 69 6E 67 72 65 64 5F 73 63 72 61 70 5F 6D 65 74 61 6C 5F 30 31 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 12 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 72 76 52 75 62 62 65 72 01 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 15 69 6E 67 72 65 64 5F 73 63 72 61 70 5F 6D 65 74 61 6C 5F 30 31 01 00 00 10 23 00 59 6F 75 20 6D 61 6B 65 20 61 20 73 74 72 61 70 20 74 6F 20 63 6F 76 65 72 20 74 68 65 20 6C 65 61 6B 2E 00 00 15 10 01 00 00 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 32 2E 31 24 01 07 01 01 00 10 3A 00 59 6F 75 20 6E 65 65 64 20 64 77 65 6D 65 72 20 72 75 62 62 65 72 20 61 6E 64 20 73 63 72 61 70 20 6D 65 74 61 6C 20 74 6F 20 72 65 70 61 69 72 20 74 68 65 20 6C 65 61 6B 2E 00 00 09 01 07 01 01 00 10 3A 00 59 6F 75 20 6E 65 65 64 20 64 77 65 6D 65 72 20 72 75 62 62 65 72 20 61 6E 64 20 73 63 72 61 70 20 6D 65 74 61 6C 20 74 6F 20 72 65 70 61 69 72 20 74 68 65 20 6C 65 61 6B 2E 00 00 09 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvPipeBurst_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == broken
; state 1 == placing strap
; state 2 == fixed

; idle == broken
; idle2 == placing strap
; idle3 == fixed

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""Steam"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""Steam"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		PlayGroup Idle3
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 0
		; THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN MAKE SOMETHING ELSE HAPPEN AFTER FIXING IT
		StopSound ""Steam""
		set state to 2
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""AB_Misc_DwrvRubber"" >= 1 )
			if ( Player->GetItemCount ""ingred_scrap_metal_01"" >= 1 ) 
				Player->RemoveItem ""AB_Misc_DwrvRubber"" 1
				Player->RemoveItem ""ingred_scrap_metal_01"" 1
				MessageBox ""You make a strap to cover the leak.""
				LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
				set state to 1
				set timer to 2.1
				Return
			else
				MessageBox ""You need dwemer rubber and scrap metal to repair the leak.""
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You need dwemer rubber and scrap metal to repair the leak.""
		endif
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End
$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvPowerBox_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$9E$01$00$00$0C$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 74 61 74 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 08 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 06 01 01 16 20 58 88 11 20 62 0A 53 6F 74 68 61 53 70 61 72 6B 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0A 53 6F 74 68 61 53 70 61 72 6B 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 14 10 02 00 00 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 06 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 08 01 02 09 20 66 01 00 20 3C 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 09 01 06 01 10 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 0C 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 07 1A 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 0E 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 57 69 72 65 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 0E 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 57 69 72 65 01 00 00 10 18 00 59 6F 75 20 72 65 70 61 69 72 20 74 68 65 20 63 75 74 20 77 69 72 65 2E 00 00 15 10 01 00 00 01 51 11 0A 53 6F 74 68 61 53 70 61 72 6B 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 30 2E 38 24 01 07 01 02 00 10 2B 00 59 6F 75 20 6E 65 65 64 20 44 77 65 6D 65 72 20 57 69 72 65 20 74 6F 20 66 69 78 20 74 68 65 20 63 6F 6E 6E 65 63 74 69 6F 6E 2E 00 00 24 01 09 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_DwrvPowerBox_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 == broken
; state 1 == placing wire
; state 2 == fixed

; idle == broken
; idle2 == placing wire
; idle3 == fixed

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		PlayGroup Idle
		if ( GetSoundPlaying ""SothaSpark"" == 0 )
			PlayLoopSound3DVP ""SothaSpark"", 1.0, 1.0
		endif
	elseif ( state == 2 )
		PlayGroup Idle3
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	if ( timer > 0 )
		set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	elseif ( timer <= 0 )
		set timer to 0
		; THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN MAKE SOMETHING ELSE HAPPEN AFTER FIXING IT
		set state to 2
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	if ( state == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount ""AB_Misc_DwWire"" >= 1 )
			Player->RemoveItem ""AB_Misc_DwWire"" 1
			MessageBox ""You repair the cut wire.""
			LoopGroup Idle2 0 1
			StopSound ""SothaSpark""
			set state to 1
			set timer to 0.8
			Return
		else
			MessageBox ""You need Dwemer Wire to fix the connection.""
			Return
		endif
	else
		Return
	endif
endif


End
$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_DwrvProxMine_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$03$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$DA$01$00$00$1F$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [64 69 73 61 72 6D 65 64 00 65 78 70 6C 6F 64 65 00 63 6C 65 61 6E 75 70 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 00 18 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 10 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 44 77 47 79 72 6F 30 30 00 07 01 06 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 24 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 04 09 20 73 03 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 02 09 20 58 DC 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 AB 11 01 00 05 01 73 03 00 02 20 32 09 01 09 01 06 01 0A 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 73 02 00 20 3E 20 30 24 01 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 31 24 01 08 01 04 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 17 10 02 10 15 49 74 65 6D 20 41 72 6D 6F 72 20 48 65 61 76 79 20 44 6F 77 6E 09 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 02 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 24 01 09 01 06 01 05 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 02 10 0C 53 61 74 63 68 65 6C 42 6C 61 73 74 15 10 03 00 00 00 14 10 04 00 00 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 32 AD 11 14 41 42 5F 74 72 61 70 5F 44 77 72 76 50 72 6F 78 4D 69 6E 65 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 DB 10 05 01 73 03 00 02 20 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 14 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3E 3D 20 32 35 36 24 01 09 01 06 01 04 05 20 58 8A 11 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 14 20 58 74 10 20 3E 3D 20 47 09 52 61 6E 64 6F 6D 31 30 30 00 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 34 24 01 09 01 09 01 02 10 0C 63 72 6F 73 73 62 6F 77 50 75 6C 6C 15 10 01 00 00 00 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 04 20 31 2E 35 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_DwrvProxMine_s

float timer
short disarmed
short explode
short cleanup

; Idle - idle
; Idle2 - setting
; Idle3 - set
; Idle4 - exploding

; don't explode prox mine has been disarmed
if ( GetItemCount AB_Misc_DwGyro00 )
else
	if ( disarmed == 0 )
		; PlayGroup death2 1
		set disarmed to 1
		return
	else
		return
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( cleanup == 1 )
	if ( getdisabled == 1 )
		setdelete 1
		set cleanup to 2
	endif
endif

; do not let the player disarm the trap if it has exploded or already been disarmed
if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( explode > 0 )
		Return
	elseif ( disarmed >= 1 )
		Return
	elseif ( explode == 0 )
		if ( disarmed == 0 )
			Activate
			PlaySound ""Item Armor Heavy Down""
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	return
endif

; play anim when explosion triggered
if ( explode == 1 )
	PlaySound ""SatchelBlast""
	LoopGroup Idle4 0 0
	PlayGroup Idle5 0
	set explode to 2
	ExplodeSpell ""AB_trap_DwrvProxMine""
	;if ( GetDistance player < 64 )
	;	Player->Equip AB_eff_KwamaPoison
	;endif
endif

; don't continue if we have exploded
if ( explode == 2 )
	disable
	set cleanup to 1
	Return
endif

; don't explode if player is too far away
if ( GetDistance player >= 256 )
    return
endif

; don't explode if player passes sneak check
if ( GetPCSneaking )
	if ( player->GetSneak >= Random100 )
		set timer to 4
		return
	endif
endif

; must be touch range spells
PlaySound crossbowPull
LoopGroup Idle2 0 0
set explode to 1
set timer to 1.5

end$00"
-SCPT

	Return

	disable
	set doonce to 1

	set doonce to -1

	return

 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_GeyserVFX_s

float timepassed
short damage

DontSaveObject

If (MenuMode==1)
	Return
endif

Set timepassed to (timepassed + GetSecondsPassed)

If ( timepassed < 7 )
	if ( timepassed < 0.5 )
		if ( damage == 0 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 1
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 1 )
		if ( damage == 1 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 2
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 1.5 )
		if ( damage == 2 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 3
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 2 )
		if ( damage == 3 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 4
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 2.5 )
		if ( damage == 4 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 5
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 3 )
		if ( damage == 5 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 6
		endif
	elseif ( timepassed < 3.5 )
		if ( damage == 6 )
			PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_GeyserWaterDMG"" 1 0 0
			set damage to 7
		endif
	endif
	return
elseif ( timepassed > 9 )
	setdelete 1
elseif ( timepassed >= 7 )
	disable
endif

end$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_GrinderWheel_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$AF$01$00$00$11$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [41 63 74 69 6F 6E 46 6C 61 67 00 54 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 06 05 20 58 18 10 00 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1E 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 13 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 57 68 65 65 6C 20 3C 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 13 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 57 68 65 65 6C 01 00 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 15 10 01 00 05 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 13 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 57 68 65 65 6C 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 08 01 0D 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 06 01 01 19 20 58 88 11 20 62 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1E 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 13 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 57 68 65 65 6C 20 3E 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 13 41 42 5F 52 65 70 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 65 72 57 68 65 65 6C 01 00 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 0A 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 36 2E 30 24 01 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 14 10 00 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 06 01 01 15 20 58 88 11 20 62 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 00 51 11 0D 41 42 5F 47 72 69 6E 64 53 74 6F 6E 65 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_GrinderWheel_s

Short ActionFlag
Float Timer

If ( MenuMode )
	Return
Endif

If ( OnActivate )
	If ( ActionFlag == 0 )
		If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_GrinderWheel < 1 )
			Player->AddItem AB_Rep_GrinderWheel 1
		Endif
		Set ActionFlag to 1
	Endif
Endif

If ( ActionFlag == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 5 0
	Player->Equip AB_Rep_GrinderWheel
	Set ActionFlag to 2
Elseif ( ActionFlag == 2 )
	If ( GetSoundPlaying ""AB_GrindStone"" == 0 )
		PlayLoopSound3DVP ""AB_GrindStone"" 1.0 1.0
	Endif
	If ( Player->GetItemCount AB_Rep_GrinderWheel > 0 )
		Player->RemoveItem AB_Rep_GrinderWheel 1
	endif
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	If ( timer < 6.0 )
		Return
	Endif
	Set timer to 0
	PlayGroup Idle 0
	Set ActionFlag to 0
Endif

If ( GetSoundPlaying ""AB_GrindStone"" )
	StopSound ""AB_GrindStone""
Endif

End
$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_ImpHiddenDoor_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$AC$00$00$00$13$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [6F 70 65 6E 65 64 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00 61 6E 67 6C 65 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 07 08 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 05 20 73 01 00 00 07 10 58 00 00 B4 C2 07 01 01 07 10 58 00 00 B4 42 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 06 05 20 58 18 10 00 2C 11 11 53 74 6F 6E 65 20 44 6F 6F 72 20 4F 70 65 6E 20 31 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 31 20 73 01 00 20 2D 05 01 66 01 00 07 20 2D 31 20 31 20 2A 17 10 05 01 66 02 00 16 20 58 0C 10 58 20 31 38 30 20 73 01 00 20 2A 20 2D 20 39 30 20 2B 24 01 09 01 0D 10 58 66 02 00 00 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_ImpHiddenDoor_s

float timer
float angle

short opened

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( timer < 0 )
    ; opening/closing is in progress
    set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
    if ( opened )
        Rotate X -90
    else
        Rotate X 90
    endif
    return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
    ; start the opening/closing process
    PlaySound3D ""Stone Door Open 1""
    set opened to 1 - opened
    set timer to -1
    Activate
    ; calculate the desired final angle
    set angle to ( GetAngle X - ( 180 * opened ) + 90 )
    return
endif

SetAngle X angle

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_ImpHiddenTrapDoor_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00j$01$00$00	$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [4F 6E 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 02 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 10 10 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 06 01 23 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 06 09 20 58 13 11 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 2C 11 11 53 74 6F 6E 65 20 44 6F 6F 72 20 4F 70 65 6E 20 31 DE 10 09 01 09 01 06 01 08 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 31 07 10 58 00 00 B0 C2 08 01 03 09 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 DD 10 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 08 01 08 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 35 24 01 08 01 03 09 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 35 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 33 2C 11 11 53 74 6F 6E 65 20 44 6F 6F 72 20 4F 70 65 6E 20 31 09 01 08 01 07 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 33 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 31 07 10 58 00 00 B0 42 08 01 02 09 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 31 10 10 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_ImpHiddenTrapDoor_s

float timer
short On

DontSaveObject

if (CellChanged == 1)
	SetatStart
	set On to 0
endif

if (MenuMode == 0)

	if (GetStandingPC == 1)

		if (On == 0)
			set timer to 0
			set On to 1
			PlaySound3D, ""Stone Door Open 1""
			DisablePlayerControls
		endif

	endif

	if (On == 1)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 1)
			rotate x, -88

		elseif (timer >= 1)
			set timer to 0
			EnablePlayerControls
			set On to 2

		endif

	elseif (On == 2)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 5)
			return

		elseif (timer >= 5)
			set timer to 0
			set On to 3
			PlaySound3D, ""Stone Door Open 1""

		endif

	elseif (On == 3)

		set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

		if (timer < 1)
			rotate x, 88

		elseif (timer >= 1)
			SetatStart
			set On to 0

		endif

	endif

endif

end

$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_KwamaAcidPool_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00#$01$00$00#$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [64 6F 4F 6E 63 65 00 50 6F 74 69 6F 6E 44 75 72 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 54 69 6D 65 53 74 61 6D 70 4E 6F 77 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 73 02 00 03 20 32 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 06 01 03 05 20 58 1F 10 00 06 01 01 16 20 58 88 11 20 62 0A 6F 69 6C 20 62 75 62 62 6C 79 20 3D 3D 20 30 2F 11 0A 6F 69 6C 20 62 75 62 62 6C 79 00 00 80 3F 00 00 80 3F 09 01 09 01 06 01 05 05 20 58 13 11 00 05 01 66 01 00 1F 20 47 0A 44 61 79 73 50 61 73 73 65 64 20 32 34 20 2A 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 2B 06 01 02 24 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 47 1A 41 42 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 41 63 69 64 50 6F 6F 6C 45 78 70 69 72 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 05 01 47 1A 41 42 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 41 63 69 64 50 6F 6F 6C 45 78 70 69 72 61 74 69 6F 6E 21 20 66 01 00 20 73 02 00 20 33 36 30 30 2E 30 20 2F 20 47 09 54 69 6D 65 53 63 61 6C 65 20 2A 20 2B 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 12 41 42 5F 65 66 66 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 50 6F 69 73 6F 6E 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_KwamaAcidPool_s

short doOnce
short PotionDuration
float TimeStampNow

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	set PotionDuration to 20
	set doOnce to 1
endif

if ( CellChanged )
    if ( GetSoundPlaying ""oil bubbly"" == 0 )
        PlayLoopSound3DVP ""oil bubbly"" 1.0 1.0
    endif
endif

if ( GetStandingPC )
    set TimeStampNow to ( DaysPassed * 24 + GameHour )
    if ( TimeStampNow > AB_KwamaAcidPoolExpiration )
        set AB_KwamaAcidPoolExpiration to ( TimeStampNow + PotionDuration / 3600.0 * TimeScale )
        Player->Equip AB_eff_KwamaPoison
    endif
endif

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_KwamaEffect_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$05$00$00$00h$01$00$00&$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [73 70 6C 61 74 57 61 73 54 72 69 67 67 65 72 65 64 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00 64 78 00 64 79 00 64 7A 00 64 69 73 74 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 0A 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 31 2E 35 24 01 09 01 06 01 07 05 20 73 01 00 00 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 35 AB 11 01 00 08 01 00 05 20 58 DC 10 00 08 01 01 09 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 33 DB 10 09 01 24 01 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 14 20 58 B4 10 20 3E 3D 20 47 09 52 61 6E 64 6F 6D 31 30 30 00 24 01 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 05 01 66 04 00 06 20 58 0A 10 5A 00 06 01 01 0D 20 66 04 00 20 3E 3D 20 58 0A 10 5A 00 24 01 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 05 01 66 02 00 06 20 58 0A 10 58 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 05 01 66 03 00 06 20 58 0A 10 59 00 05 01 66 02 00 0B 20 66 02 00 20 58 0A 10 58 20 2D 05 01 66 03 00 0B 20 66 03 00 20 58 0A 10 59 20 2D 05 01 66 05 00 16 20 66 02 00 20 66 02 00 20 2A 20 66 03 00 20 66 03 00 20 2A 20 2B 05 01 66 05 00 09 20 58 AC 11 20 66 05 00 00 06 01 01 0B 20 66 05 00 20 3E 3D 20 31 30 30 24 01 09 01 02 10 08 41 42 5F 53 70 6C 61 74 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1D 11 06 64 72 6F 6F 70 73 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_KwamaEffect_s

short splatWasTriggered
float timer
float dx
float dy
float dz
float dist

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )


;# give player some time to clear out
if ( timer < 1.5 )
  	return
endif

  
if ( splatWasTriggered )
	if ( timer > 5 )
  		SetDelete 1
    elseif ( GetDisabled )
	elseif ( timer >= 3 )
  		Disable
    endif
  	return
endif


set splatWasTriggered to 1

;# give player a chance to resist
if ( Player->GetResistDisease >= Random100 )
  	return
endif
  

;# player must be below on Z axis
set dz to ( player->GetPos Z )
if ( dz >= GetPos Z )
    return
endif


;# player must be within 100 units on X/Y axis
set dx to ( Player->GetPos X )
set dy to ( Player->GetPos Y )
set dx to ( dx - ( GetPos X ) )
set dy to ( dy - ( GetPos Y ) )
set dist to ( dx * dx + dy * dy )
set dist to GetSquareRoot dist
if ( dist >= 100 )
  	return
endif


;# all requirements statisfied, trigger the splat
PlaySound ""AB_Splat""
player->AddSpell ""droops""


end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_KwamaEggBlighted_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00w$00$00$00$13$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [72 61 6E 00 70 63 42 6C 69 67 68 74 52 65 73 69 73 74 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 09 05 20 58 18 10 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 05 01 73 02 00 05 20 58 B7 10 00 05 01 73 01 00 0D 20 47 09 52 61 6E 64 6F 6D 31 30 30 00 05 01 73 01 00 10 20 73 01 00 20 30 2E 33 20 73 02 00 20 2A 20 2B 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 33 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1D 11 0B 61 73 68 2D 63 68 61 6E 63 72 65 17 10 07 01 01 17 10 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_KwamaEggBlighted_s

Short ran
Short pcBlightResist

if ( OnActivate )
	set pcBlightResist to ( Player->GetResistBlight )
	set ran to random100
	set ran to ( ran + 0.3 * pcBlightResist )
	if ( ran < 30 )
		Player->AddSpell ""ash-chancre""
		Activate
	else
		Activate
	endif
endif


End$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_KwamaEggBomb_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$B3$01$00$00$15$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [6C 6F 6F 74 65 64 00 65 78 70 6C 6F 64 65 00 74 69 6D 65 72 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 00 17 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 0F 41 42 5F 6C 76 6C 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 45 67 67 00 08 01 00 19 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 11 66 6F 6F 64 5F 6B 77 61 6D 61 5F 65 67 67 5F 30 32 00 07 01 07 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 1C 00 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 24 01 07 01 01 24 01 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 08 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 08 20 73 02 00 20 3E 20 30 24 01 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 07 01 02 17 10 02 10 0D 41 42 5F 53 6C 69 6D 79 54 6F 75 63 68 09 01 09 01 06 01 02 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 24 01 09 01 06 01 05 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 14 10 1B 00 01 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 32 06 01 01 12 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3C 20 36 34 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 12 41 42 5F 65 66 66 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 50 6F 69 73 6F 6E 09 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 14 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3E 3D 20 31 35 30 24 01 09 01 06 01 04 05 20 58 8A 11 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 13 20 58 74 10 20 3E 20 47 09 52 61 6E 64 6F 6D 31 30 30 00 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 34 24 01 09 01 09 01 02 10 0A 73 63 72 69 62 20 72 6F 61 72 02 10 0B 6B 77 61 6D 61 46 20 6C 65 66 74 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 31 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 31 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_KwamaEggBomb_s

float timer
short looted
short explode

; don't explode if kwama egg already looted
if ( GetItemCount AB_lvl_KwamaEgg )
elseif ( GetItemCount food_kwama_egg_02 )
else
	if ( looted == 0 )
		PlayGroup death2 1
		set looted to 1
		return
	else
		return
	endif
endif

if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif

; do not let the player loot the egg if it has exploded or already been looted
if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( explode > 0 )
		Return
	elseif ( looted == 1 )
		Return
	else
		Activate
		PlaySound ""AB_SlimyTouch""
	endif
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif

; play anim when explosion triggered
if ( explode == 1 )
	PlayGroup death1 1
	set explode to 2
	if ( GetDistance player < 64 )
		Player->Equip AB_eff_KwamaPoison
	endif
endif

; don't continue if we have exploded
if ( explode == 2 )
	Return
endif

; don't explode if player is too far away
if ( GetDistance player >= 150 )
    return
endif

; don't explode if player passes sneak check
if ( GetPCSneaking )
	if ( player->GetSneak > Random100 )
		set timer to 4
		return
	endif
endif

; must be touch range spells
PlaySound ""scrib roar""
PlaySound ""kwamaF left""
set explode to 1
set timer to 1

end$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_KwamaForagerPeek_s

Short reset
Float timer

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

if ( CellChanged )
	if ( reset )
		set reset to 0
	endif
endif

if ( GetDistance ""player"" >= 1024 )
	if ( reset )
		set reset to 0
	endif
endif

if ( reset )
	LoopGroup Idle 1
	return
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
	return
endif

if ( GetDistance ""player"" > 600 )
	return
endif

if ( Random100 < 50 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 1 1
	set timer to 20
	set reset to 1
else
	set timer to 5
endif


End$00"

 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2D 24 01 09 01 06 01 04 05 20 73 01 00 00 15 10 00 00 02 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 38 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 13 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3E 20 35 30 30 24 01 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 07 20 58 21 10 02 00 00 06 01 03 05 20 73 01 00 00 15 10 01 00 01 01 BA 11 0F 41 42 5F 46 78 5F 4B 77 61 6D 61 50 75 6B 65 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 32 07 01 02 15 10 00 00 01 01 05 01 66 01 00 02 20 34 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_KwamaForagerStorage_s

float timer
short puking


DontSaveObject


if ( MenuMode )
    return
endif


if ( timer > 0 )
    set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )
    return
endif


if ( puking )
    ; was previously puking, stop
    ; MessageBox ""STOP PUKING - LoopGroup Idle""
    LoopGroup Idle 2 1
    set puking to 0
    set timer to 8
    return
endif


if ( GetDistance ""player"" > 500 )
    return
endif


; was not puking, roll to start
set puking to Random 2
if ( puking )
	; MessageBox ""PUKE ROLL=FAIL - Idle2 1""
	LoopGroup Idle2 1 1
	PlaceAtMe ""AB_Fx_KwamaPuke"" 1 0 0
	set timer to 2
else
	; MessageBox ""PUKE ROLL=PASS - Idle""
	LoopGroup Idle 1 1
	set timer to 4
endif


end$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_LevitationDisabled_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$05$01$00$00$00$00$00$00"

 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_LevitationDisabled_s

;global script

if ( CellChanged )

	StopScript, AB_LevitationDisabled_s
	Set AB_LevitationDisabled to ( AB_LevitationDisabled - 1 )

	elseif ( GetPCCell ""Mournhold"" == 1 )

	endif

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_LightSourceDay_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$02$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$90$02$00$00$0D$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [70 6F 73 58 00 6D 79 53 74 61 74 65 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 06 09 20 58 1F 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 35 32 30 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 31 07 01 01 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 06 20 58 0A 10 58 00 06 01 05 10 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 32 31 06 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 35 34 32 30 0B 10 58 00 60 A9 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 3F 09 01 24 01 08 01 04 10 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 32 30 06 01 01 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 35 34 32 30 08 10 58 00 00 20 41 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 16 08 20 58 A1 10 20 3C 20 32 06 01 08 0F 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 37 06 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 34 32 30 0B 10 58 00 20 8A 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 BF 08 01 03 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 DB 10 DA 10 09 01 08 01 07 0F 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 36 06 01 01 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 34 32 30 08 10 58 00 00 20 C1 08 01 03 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 DB 10 DA 10 09 01 08 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 35 34 32 30 0B 10 58 00 60 A9 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 3F 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 1C 08 20 58 A1 10 20 3C 20 35 06 01 0B 0F 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 37 06 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 35 32 30 0B 10 58 00 40 8D 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 BF 08 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 34 35 31 30 0B 10 58 00 40 8D 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 BF 08 01 03 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 DB 10 DA 10 09 01 08 01 0A 0F 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 36 06 01 01 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3E 20 34 35 32 30 08 10 58 00 00 20 C1 08 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 34 35 31 30 0B 10 58 00 40 8D 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 BF 08 01 03 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 02 00 02 20 30 DB 10 DA 10 09 01 08 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 35 34 32 30 0B 10 58 00 60 A9 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 3F 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 0B 20 73 01 00 20 3C 20 35 34 32 30 0B 10 58 00 60 A9 45 08 10 58 00 00 80 3F 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_LightSourceDay_s

short posX
short myState

DontSaveObject

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	if ( posX > 4520 )
		set myState to 1
	else
		set myState to 0
	endif
	return
endif

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

set posX to ( GetPos x )

if ( Gamehour > 21 )
	if ( posX < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return
elseif ( Gamehour > 20 )
	if ( posX < 5420 )
		MoveWorld x 10
	endif
	return
endif

if ( GetCurrentWeather < 2 )
	if ( Gamehour > 7 )
		if ( posX > 4420 )
			SetPos x 4420
			MoveWorld x -1
		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			Disable
			Enable
		endif
	elseif ( Gamehour > 6 )
		if ( posX > 4420 )
			MoveWorld x -10
		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			Disable
			Enable
		endif
	elseif ( posX < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return
endif

if ( GetCurrentWeather < 5 )
	if ( Gamehour > 7 )
		if ( posX > 4520 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1
		elseif ( posX < 4510 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1

		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			Disable
			Enable
		endif
	elseif ( Gamehour > 6 )
		if ( posX > 4520 )
			MoveWorld x -10
		elseif ( posX < 4510 )
			SetPos x 4520
			MoveWorld x -1
		elseif ( myState == 1 )
			set myState to 0
			Disable
			Enable
		endif
	elseif ( posX < 5420 )
		SetPos x 5420
		MoveWorld x 1
	endif
	return
endif

if ( posX < 5420 )
	SetPos x 5420
	MoveWorld x 1
endif

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_LightningLight_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$82$00$00$00$12$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [64 6F 6F 6E 63 65 00 74 69 6D 65 70 61 73 73 65 64 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 01 07 20 58 20 10 3D 3D 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 DB 10 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 08 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 DA 10 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 3C 30 2E 31 24 01 08 01 01 07 20 66 01 00 20 3E 32 AB 11 01 00 08 01 01 0A 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 30 2E 32 DB 10 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_LightningLight_s

short doonce
float timepassed

DontSaveObject 

If (MenuMode==1)
	Return
endif

; moveworld z 5
; move x 5
; rotate y 5

if ( doonce == 0 )
	disable
	set doonce to 1
elseif ( doonce == 1 )
	enable
	set doonce to 2
endif

Set timepassed to (timepassed + GetSecondsPassed)

If (timepassed<0.1)
	return
elseif (timepassed >2)
	setdelete 1
elseif (timepassed >=0.2)
	disable
endif

end

$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_MagicFxCast2second_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00d$00$00$00$06$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "timer$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 01 05 20 58 20 10 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 01 09 20 66 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 14 10 00 00 01 09 01 05 01 66 01 00 0A 20 66 01 00 20 58 12 10 20 2B 06 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3C 20 31 24 01 08 01 01 08 20 66 01 00 20 3E 20 33 AB 11 01 00 08 01 01 09 20 66 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 32 DB 10 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_MagicFxCast2second_s

float timer

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( timer == 0 )
	PlayGroup Idle 1
endif

Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

if ( timer < 1 )
	return
elseif ( timer > 3 )
	setDelete 1
elseif ( timer >= 2 )
	Disable
endif

end

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_NightActivate_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$8A$00$00$00	$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "toEnable$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [5F 11 06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 06 01 01 0F 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3C 20 36 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 08 01 01 10 20 47 08 47 61 6D 65 48 6F 75 72 20 3E 20 31 38 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 06 01 01 09 20 58 DC 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 DA 10 09 01 07 01 03 06 01 01 09 20 58 DC 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 DB 10 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_NightActivate_s

short toEnable

DontSaveObject

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
        return
endif

set toEnable to 0

if ( GameHour < 6 )
	set toEnable to 1
elseif ( GameHour > 18 )
	set toEnable to 1
endif

if ( toEnable == 1)
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		Enable
	endif
else
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

End




$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_OgrimOilLamp_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$E7$00$00$00$00$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 03 13 20 58 01 10 20 72 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 20 3C 20 32 35 36 06 01 01 16 20 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 20 3C 20 31 05 01 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 02 20 32 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 08 01 03 25 20 58 99 11 20 6F 1D 41 42 5F 6C 69 67 68 74 5F 45 6E 63 68 4F 67 72 69 6D 4F 69 6C 4C 61 6D 70 5F 32 30 30 00 06 01 01 16 20 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 20 3C 20 31 05 01 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 02 20 32 09 01 07 01 03 06 01 01 17 20 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 20 3D 3D 20 32 05 01 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 02 20 30 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_OgrimOilLamp_s

if ( GetDistance Player < 256 )
	if ( AB_EnchantBonus < 1 )
		set AB_EnchantBonus to 2
	endif
elseif ( Player->HasItemEquipped ""AB_light_EnchOgrimOilLamp_200"" )
	if ( AB_EnchantBonus < 1 )
		set AB_EnchantBonus to 2
	endif
else
	if ( AB_EnchantBonus == 2 )
		set AB_EnchantBonus to 0
	endif
endif


End
$00"

 SCPT.SCHD "AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$0D$05$00$00$06$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "state$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 24 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 04 17 20 47 0F 41 42 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 20 3D 3D 20 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 1E 20 58 1F 11 20 6F 12 41 42 5F 65 72 0E 11 13 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 4C 65 73 73 65 72 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1B 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 13 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 43 6F 6D 6D 6F 6E 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 13 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 43 6F 6D 6D 6F 6E 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1C 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 14 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 47 72 65 61 74 65 72 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 14 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 47 72 65 61 74 65 72 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1A 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 12 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 47 72 61 6E 64 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 12 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 47 72 61 6E 64 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1A 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 12 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 41 7A 75 72 61 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 0E 11 12 4D 69 73 63 5F 53 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 5F 41 7A 75 72 61 09 01 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 0A 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 00 10 01 00 20 00 00 00 10 01 00 20 00 00 06 01 02 05 20 58 20 10 00 00 10 46 00 59 6F 75 72 20 65 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 6D 65 6E 74 73 20 77 69 6C 6C 20 62 65 20 6D 6F 72 65 20 70 6F 74 65 6E 74 20 77 68 69 6C 65 20 75 73 69 6E 67 20 61 6E 20 65 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 69 6E 67 20 74 61 62 6C 65 2E 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 32 07 01 02 00 10 23 00 59 6F 75 20 64 6F 6E 27 74 20 68 61 76 65 20 61 6E 79 20 66 69 6C 6C 65 64 20 73 6F 75 6C 67 65 6D 73 2E 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 33 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 04 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 32 06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 33 09 01 24 01 09 01 06 01 0B 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 33 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 1A 20 58 1F 11 20 6F 12 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1E 11 12 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 08 01 01 1F 20 58 1F 11 20 6F 17 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 53 63 61 6D 70 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1E 11 17 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 53 63 61 6D 70 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 08 01 01 1F 20 58 1F 11 20 6F 17 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 4F 67 72 69 6D 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 1E 11 17 41 42 5F 61 62 5F 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 42 6F 6E 75 73 4F 67 72 69 6D 07 01 02 1C 10 14 41 42 5F 4F 70 65 6E 45 6E 63 68 61 6E 74 4D 65 6E 75 5F 73 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 09 01 24 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s

short state

if ( state == 0 )
    ; add temp enchant bonus
	if ( AB_EnchantBonus == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonus"" == 0 )
			Player->AddSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonus""
			return
		endif
	elseif ( AB_EnchantBonus == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp"" == 0 )
			Player->AddSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp""
			return
		endif
	elseif ( AB_EnchantBonus == 2 )
		if ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusOgrim"" == 0 )
			Player->AddSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusOgrim""
			return
		endif
	endif
    ; try to equip a soulgem
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Petty"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Petty""
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Lesser"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Lesser""
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Common"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Common""
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Greater"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Greater""
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Grand"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Grand""
    endif
    if ( Player->GetItemCount ""Misc_Soulgem_Azura"" )
        Player->Equip ""Misc_Soulgem_Azura""
    endif
    set state to 1
    return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
    ; check if equipping worked
    MessageBox "" ""
    MessageBox "" ""
    if ( MenuMode )
        MessageBox ""Your enchantments will be more potent while using an enchanting table.""
        set state to 2
    else
        MessageBox ""You don't have any filled soulgems.""
        set state to 3
    endif
    return
endif

if ( state == 2 )
    ; wait until done enchanting
    if ( MenuMode == 0 )
        set state to 3
    endif
    return
endif

if ( state == 3 )
    ; remove buff and stopscript
    if ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonus"" )
        Player->RemoveSpell AB_ab_EnchantBonus
    elseif ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp"" )
        Player->RemoveSpell AB_ab_EnchantBonusScamp
    elseif ( Player->GetSpell ""AB_ab_EnchantBonusOgrim"" )
        Player->RemoveSpell AB_ab_EnchantBonusOgrim
    else
        StopScript AB_OpenEnchantMenu_s
        set state to 0
    endif
    return
endif

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$0F$01$00$00$05$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "gold$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [05 01 73 01 00 08 20 58 21 10 64 00 30 30 00 10 0D 00 25 67 20 47 6F 6C 64 20 41 64 64 65 64 01 73 01 00 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 02 10 0C 49 74 65 6D 20 47 6F 6C 64 20 55 70 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 11 41 42 5F 4D 69 73 63 5F 50 75 72 73 65 43 6F 69 6E 01 00 0A 01 02 0A 20 73 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 32 30 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 08 47 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 14 00 05 01 73 01 00 09 20 73 01 00 20 32 30 20 2D 0B 01 0A 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 35 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 08 47 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 05 00 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 73 01 00 20 35 20 2D 0B 01 0A 01 02 09 20 73 01 00 20 3E 3D 20 31 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D4 10 08 47 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 01 00 05 01 73 01 00 08 20 73 01 00 20 31 20 2D 0B 01 1C 10 14 41 42 5F 50 75 72 73 65 43 6F 69 6E 47 6C 6F 62 61 6C 5F 73 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s

short gold

set gold to Random 100
MessageBox ""%g Gold Added"" gold
Player->PlaySound ""Item Gold Up""
Player->RemoveItem ""AB_Misc_PurseCoin"" 1

while ( gold >= 20 )
    Player->AddItem ""Gold_001"" 20
    set gold to ( gold - 20 )
endwhile
while ( gold >= 5 )
    Player->AddItem ""Gold_001"" 5
    set gold to ( gold - 5 )
endwhile
while ( gold >= 1 )
    Player->AddItem ""Gold_001"" 1
    set gold to ( gold - 1 )
endwhile

StopScript AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s

end$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_PurseCoin_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$01$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00,$00$00$00$0A$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR "OnPCEquip$00"
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 02 05 20 73 01 00 00 05 01 73 01 00 02 20 30 1B 10 14 41 42 5F 50 75 72 73 65 43 6F 69 6E 47 6C 6F 62 61 6C 5F 73 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "begin AB_PurseCoin_s

short OnPCEquip

if ( OnPCEquip )
    set OnPCEquip to 0
    StartScript AB_PurseCoinGlobal_s
endif

end$00"
-SCPT

74 65 61 6C 74 68 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 23 11 15 41 6C 6D 73 69 76 69 20 52 65 73 74 6F 72 65 20 4F 74 68 65 72 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 01 0A 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 33 35 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 08 47 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 23 00 08 01 01 09 20 73 02 00 20 3D 3D 20 35 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 08 47 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 05 00 09 01 05 01 73 03 00 02 20 30 09 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_ShrineAlma_s


;Cure Common Disease [and Cure Common Disease Other] do not currently work through scripts; reported as a bug
short button
short donation
short QuestionState

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		Return
	endif
endif

;set donation amount
if ( player->GetPCRank ""Temple"" >= 2 )			;member of rank 2 or above
	Set donation to 0
elseif ( player->GetPCRank ""Temple"" >= 0 )		;member below rank 2
	Set donation to 5
else																;not a member
	Set donation to 35
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount Gold_001 < donation )
	MessageBox ""You do not have enough gold to make a donation."" ""OK""
	Return
endif

if ( QuestionState == 0 )
	MessageBox ""Would you like to make a donation of %.0f and receive a blessing?"" donation ""Yes"" ""No""
	set QuestionState to 10
endif

;Ask second question 
if ( QuestionState == 10 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		MessageBox ""What blessing do you ask for?"" ""Cure Disease"" ""Cure Blight"" ""Cure Poison"" ""Lady's Grace"" ""Almsivi Restoration""
		set QuestionState to 20
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	Return

endif

;perform cure or give message
if ( QuestionState == 20 )
	
	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetCommonDisease == 1 )
			Cast ""Cure Common Disease Other"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not afflicted with a common disease."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetBlightDisease == 1 )
			Cast ""Cure Blight Disease"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not afflicted with a blight disease."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 2 )
		if ( Player->GetEffect sEffectPoison == 1 )				;check for poison effect on player
			Cast ""Cure Poison Touch"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not poisoned."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 3 )
		Cast ""Lady's Grace shrine"" Player					;Fortify Endurance 5
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 4 )
		Cast ""Almsivi Restoration"" Player					;restore eight attributes
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Fighter"" Player					;restore eight fighter skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Mage"" Player					;restore eight mage skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Stealth"" Player					;restore eight stealth skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Other"" Player					;restore three other skills
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

endif

end

$00"
-SCPT
 SCPT.SCHD "AB_ShrineAzura_s$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$03$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00$00m$02$00$00$1E$00$00$00"
 SCPT.SCVR [62 75 74 74 6F 6E 00 64 6F 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 51 75 65 73 74 69 6F 6E 53 74 61 74 65 00]
 SCPT.SCDT [06 01 01 09 20 58 20 10 20 3D 3D 20 31 24 01 09 01 06 01 03 09 20 58 18 10 20 3D 3D 20 30 06 01 01 09 20 73 03 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 24 01 09 01 09 01 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 14 20 58 FD 10 20 6F 08 67 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 20 3C 20 31 30 00 10 2F 00 59 6F 75 20 64 6F 20 6E 6F 74 20 68 61 76 65 20 65 6E 6F 75 67 68 20 67 6F 6C 64 20 74 6F 20 6D 61 6B 65 20 61 20 64 6F 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 2E 00 01 03 4F 4B 00 24 01 09 01 06 01 02 09 20 73 03 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 00 10 4A 00 57 6F 75 6C 64 20 79 6F 75 20 6C 69 6B 65 20 74 6F 20 6D 61 6B 65 20 61 20 64 6F 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 20 6F 66 20 31 30 20 67 6F 6C 64 20 61 6E 64 20 72 65 63 65 69 76 65 20 41 7A 75 72 61 27 73 20 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 3F 00 02 04 59 65 73 00 03 4E 6F 00 05 01 73 03 00 03 20 31 30 09 01 06 01 10 0A 20 73 03 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 30 05 01 73 01 00 05 20 58 1E 10 00 06 01 0A 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 30 23 11 13 41 42 5F 73 70 5F 41 7A 75 72 61 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 06 50 6C 61 79 65 72 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 D5 10 08 67 6F 6C 64 5F 30 30 31 0A 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 06 01 02 1E 20 58 21 11 20 6F 16 41 42 5F 73 70 5F 42 6F 65 74 68 69 61 68 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 00 00 10 25 00 42 6F 65 74 68 69 61 68 27 73 20 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 20 68 61 73 20 62 65 65 6E 20 72 65 6D 6F 76 65 64 2E 00 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 11 16 41 42 5F 73 70 5F 42 6F 65 74 68 69 61 68 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 08 01 02 1D 20 58 21 11 20 6F 15 41 42 5F 73 70 5F 4D 65 70 68 61 6C 61 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 00 00 10 24 00 4D 65 70 68 61 6C 61 27 73 20 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 20 68 61 73 20 62 65 65 6E 20 72 65 6D 6F 76 65 64 2E 00 00 0C 01 06 70 6C 61 79 65 72 20 11 15 41 42 5F 73 70 5F 4D 65 70 68 61 6C 61 42 6C 65 73 73 69 6E 67 09 01 05 01 73 03 00 02 20 30 08 01 01 09 20 73 01 00 20 3D 3D 20 31 05 01 73 03 00 02 20 30 09 01 24 01 09 01 01 01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_ShrineAzura_s

short button
short donation
short QuestionState

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		Return
	endif
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount gold_001 < 10 )
	MessageBox ""You do not have enough gold to make a donation."" ""OK""
	Return
endif

if ( QuestionState == 0 )
	MessageBox ""Would you like to make a donation of 10 gold and receive Azura's Blessing?"" ""Yes"" ""No""
	set QuestionState to 10
endif

;Ask second question 
if ( QuestionState == 10 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		Cast ""AB_sp_AzuraBlessing"" Player					;resist magicka 10
		Player->RemoveItem ""gold_001"" 10
		if ( Player->GetSpellEffects ""AB_sp_BoethiahBlessing"" )
			MessageBox ""Boethiah's Blessing has been removed.""
			Player->RemoveSpellEffects ""AB_sp_BoethiahBlessing""
		elseif ( Player->GetSpellEffects ""AB_sp_MephalaBlessing"" )
			MessageBox ""Mephala's Blessing has been removed.""
			Player->RemoveSpellEffects ""AB_sp_MephalaBlessing""
		endif
		set QuestionState to 0
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	Return

endif

end$00"
-SCPT

01]
 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_ShrineSotha_s


;Cure Common Disease [and Cure Common Disease Other] do not currently work through scripts; reported as a bug
short button
short donation
short QuestionState

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		Return
	endif
endif

;set donation amount
if ( player->GetPCRank ""Temple"" >= 2 )			;member of rank 2 or above
	Set donation to 0
elseif ( player->GetPCRank ""Temple"" >= 0 )		;member below rank 2
	Set donation to 5
else																;not a member
	Set donation to 35
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount Gold_001 < donation )
	MessageBox ""You do not have enough gold to make a donation."" ""OK""
	Return
endif

if ( QuestionState == 0 )
	MessageBox ""Would you like to make a donation of %.0f and receive a blessing?"" donation ""Yes"" ""No""
	set QuestionState to 10
endif

;Ask second question 
if ( QuestionState == 10 )

	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		MessageBox ""What blessing do you ask for?"" ""Cure Disease"" ""Cure Blight"" ""Cure Poison"" ""Soul of Sotha Sil"" ""Almsivi Restoration""
		set QuestionState to 20
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	Return

endif

;perform cure or give message
if ( QuestionState == 20 )
	
	Set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button == 0 )
		if ( Player->GetCommonDisease == 1 )
			Cast ""Cure Common Disease Other"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not afflicted with a common disease."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 1 )
		if ( Player->GetBlightDisease == 1 )
			Cast ""Cure Blight Disease"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not afflicted with a blight disease."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 2 )
		if ( Player->GetEffect sEffectPoison == 1 )				;check for poison effect on player
			Cast ""Cure Poison Touch"" Player
			if ( donation == 35 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
			elseif ( donation == 5 )
				Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
			endif
		else
			MessageBox ""You are not poisoned."" ""OK""
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif
	
	if ( button == 3 )
		Cast ""soul of sotha sil"" Player					;Fortify Magicka 5
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 4 )
		Cast ""Almsivi Restoration"" Player					;restore eight attributes
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Fighter"" Player					;restore eight fighter skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Mage"" Player					;restore eight mage skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Stealth"" Player					;restore eight stealth skills
		Cast ""Almsivi Restore Other"" Player					;restore three other skills
		if ( donation == 35 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 35
		elseif ( donation == 5 )
			Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 5
		endif
		Set QuestionState to 0
	endif

endif

end


$00"
-SCPT

 SCPT.SCTX "Begin AB_SpearTrap_s

short state
float timer

; state 0 + idle = dormant
; state 1 + idle2 = stabbing

if ( MenuMode )
	Return
endif

HurtCollidingActor, 40.0		;20 pts of damage a sec

if ( GetDistance player < 128 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		LoopGroup Idle2 0
		PlaySound3DVP ""Item Weapon Spear Up"" 0.5 1.0
		set state to 1
		set timer to 2.5
	endif
endif

if ( timer > 0 )
	set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed
	Return
endif

if ( state == 1 )
	set state to 0
endif


End
$00"
